duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform clerical and receptionist duties, including record organization, transcription of orders, and assembling of charts.
Maintain the physical environment of the nursing station by ordering office and replacement supplies, and entering help desk tickets for maintenance.
Coordinate interpreter services, respond to patient and family inquiries, and prioritize tasks with sound judgment.
Assist in planning, organizing, implementing, and evaluating activities at the nursing station.
Temporarily assign to different areas within the hospital based on patient needs.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Heartsaver AED certification required within 90 days of employment.
